mapper.select: SELECT dict_id dictId, field_type fieldType, remark remark, create_id createName, create_time createTime FROM manage_dict
SELECT dict_id dictId, field_type fieldType, remark remark, create_time createTime FROM manage_dict WHERE dict_id = #{dictId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO manage_dict (dict_id, field_type, remark, create_id, create_time) VALUES (#{dictId}, #{fieldType}, #{remark}, #{createId}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE manage_dict SET field_type = #{fieldType}, remark = #{remark}, update_id = #{updateId}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE dict_id = #{dictId}
